message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR 

The paper deals with the problem of estimating and forecasting 3D human pose from egocentric videos using reinforcement learning. This involves computer vision (CV) techniques for pose estimation, robotics (RO) for motion control, machine learning (LG) for reinforcement learning, artificial intelligence (AI) for the learning-based approach, and graphics (GR) for visualizing the results. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV, followed by cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, and cs.GR.
